sentence.Network_en: You need to furbish up your French before you go to France.
sentence.Network_cn: 去法国以前你必须把法语温习一下.

sentence.Network_en: I wish to furbish up the Russian I learnt at college.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要重温一下我在大学里学过的俄语.

sentence.Network_en: If you furbish up these old chairs, you'll have a better chance of selling them.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是把这些旧椅子擦亮, 就会更好卖些.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French forbiss-, lengthened stem of forbir, of Germanic origin

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"
